description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. A 2 player cooperative Isometric game. Play as the exiled vampire queen Zandri and her faithful adviser Melar, as they try to retake Zandri's queendom from the evil king Orond.
description.short: A 2 player cooperative Isometric game. Play as the exiled vampire queen Zandri and her faithful adviser Melar, as they try to retake Zandri's queendom from the evil king Orond.
